# Fraction to downsample DESI mocks redshift distribution to SDSS redshift distribution
#
# SDSS catalog: /global/homes/h/hdumasde/Run_programs/igmhub/Mocks/Scripts/cat_for_redvsblue.fits
# DESI catalog: /project/projectdirs/desi/mocks/lya_forest/develop/london/v8.0/v8.0.0/master.fits
# Removing SDSS MJD: MJD_min = 55000
# NSIDE = 16
# NEST = True
# Density low redshift quasars: z_min = 1.8
# Density criteria: density_cut = 30.0
# Step of histogram: dz = 0.04
#
# Low density HEALPix list
#0 2 8 34 41 44 47 58 135 141 142 144 146 161 162 163 168 256 257 258 259 260 261 262 263 264 265 266 267 268 269 270 272 273 274 275 276 277 278 279 280 281 282 283 284 285 286 288 289 290 291 292 294 296 297 298 320 321 322 383 384 386 387 396 398 399 421 432 433 436 437 461 462 463 466 467 468 469 470 471 472 473 474 480 481 484 512 513 514 515 516 517 518 519 520 521 522 523 524 525 526 527 # High density HEALPix list
